map.name: default
map.item:
In this task, you will be presented with an image of an object or of a texture. Your task is to respond whether the image is an object or a texture.
If the image is an object, touch [OBJECT_BUTTON] with your dominant hand.
If the image is a texture, touch [SCRAMBLED_BUTTON] with your dominant hand.
Please respond as quickly and accurately as possible.
Touch the screen to begin when you are ready.

Object = press [OBJECT_BUTTON] Texture = touch [SCRAMBLED_BUTTON]
Touch the screen to continue
Take a rest! The next set will begin soon.

Take a rest!
Touch the screen to move on to the next part.
You will start by doing a few trials for practice.

Practice trials complete!
Please wait for instructions from the experimenter.
You have completed the experiment. Thank you for participating. Touch the screen to exit.
